thread.title: Prysm installs Cascade 117 collaboration video wall solution at BAFTA 195 Piccadilly
thread.title_full: Prysm installs Cascade 117 collaboration video wall solution at BAFTA 195 Piccadilly

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Prysm installs Cascade 117 collaboration video wall solution at BAFTA 195 Piccadilly
text:
Prysm installs Cascade 117 collaboration video wall solution at BAFTA 195 Piccadilly Prysm installs Cascade 117 collaboration video wall solution at BAFTA 195 Piccadilly Details Category: Venues & Events   11:15 BAFTA 195 Piccadilly has announced a significant upgrade on its video presentation solutions with the installation of a brand new Cascade 117 collaboration video wall by video display specialists Prysm. The new system will become a popular component in the state-of-the-art audio-visual experience the venue offers to clients. 
Enhancing the venue’s credentials as a destination for media industry companies the award-winning Cascade 117 allows clients to move from passive presentations to dynamic interfaces. Cascade collaboration solutions enable users to present, share, reposition, resize and annotate all types of content through on-screen touch, while multiple, simultaneous live inputs can be displayed and interacted with on screen including video, telepresence, web apps, PCs and mobile devices. “The Cascade 117 provides an amazing platform for showcasing breakthrough work in film, television and games,” said Theresa McInerney, Acting Head of Events for BAFTA 195. “The interactivity capabilities of the Cascade solution add a rich level of engagement to the many events hosted at our venue.” “We are very excited to take the experience BAFTA 195 provides at this marquee location to a new level of immersion and engagement with our Cascade collaboration solution,” said Glenn Wastyn, vice president of Europe for Prysm. “Delivering breathtaking beauty and unmatched interactivity, Cascade solutions are the perfect match for the high standards of excellence for which BAFTA 195 is renowned.” Related articles
